                <path d="M12.524 10.782c.813-.776 1.44-1.945 1.44-3.156 0-2.238-1.686-4.06-3.771-4.06-2.084 0-3.76 1.77-3.76 3.945a4.71 4.71 0 0 0 1.414 3.313c-1.796 1.372-2.867 4.217-2.867 7.514v.68h10.415v-.68c.001-3.281-1.071-6.187-2.871-7.556zm-4.768-3.27c0-1.451 1.063-2.587 2.42-2.587 1.312 0 2.421 1.237 2.421 2.701 0 1.112-.636 2.2-1.511 2.586l-.908.4-.874-.368C8.436 9.88 7.756 8.68 7.756 7.512zM6.207 17.659c.163-2.984 1.388-5.466 3.09-6.159l.932-.38.885.345c1.694.663 2.957 3.21 3.125 6.194H6.207zM18.289 8.069h15.396v1.358H18.289zM18.289 13.502h15.396v1.358H18.289z" />
            </symbol>
            <symbol id="icon-wifi" viewBox="0 0 31.886 24">
                <path d="M17.749 22.073a1.926 1.926 0 1 1-3.854 0 1.927 1.927 0 1 1 3.854 0zM22.126 16.354l-1.952 1.951a5.99 5.99 0 0 0-8.46 0l-1.952-1.951c3.409-3.41 8.955-3.41 12.364 0zM31.886 6.593l-1.951 1.951C22.22.83 9.667.83 1.953 8.546L0 6.593c8.792-8.79 23.097-8.79 31.886 0z" />
                <path d="M27.007 11.473l-1.953 1.953c-5.021-5.023-13.196-5.023-18.22 0l-1.953-1.952c6.101-6.1 16.026-6.1 22.126-.001z" />
            </symbol>
        </svg>
    </div>
    <div id="cookies" aria-hidden="true" class="block-cookies">
        <div class="wrap">
            <div class="inner">
                <div class="text">
                    <p>En poursuivant votre navigation sur ce site, vous acceptez l’utilisation de cookies pour personnaliser votre navigation, améliorer votre expérience et disposer de services et d’offres adaptés à vos centres d’intérêts. <a class="link" href="/tourisme/fr-fr/CGU">En savoir plus</a></p>
                </div>
                <div class="button">
                    <button data-hide-cookies type="button" class="cta-push"><span>OK</span></button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

                                                                    <picture>

                                                                    <span>
                                                                        <svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon-prev">

                                                            </p>

<option value="12">12 ans</option>
<option value="13">13 ans</option>
<option value="14">14 ans</option>
<option value="15">15 ans</option>
<option value="16">16 ans</option>
<option value="17">17 ans</option>
<option value="18">18 ans</option>
<option value="19">19 ans</option>
<option value="20">20 ans</option>
<option value="21">21 ans</option>
</select><span class="label"></span>
                                </span>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="button">
                <button type="submit" class="cta"><span>rechercher</span></button>
            </div>
        </form>
    </div>
</div>
<script>
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function (event) {
        $.validator.methods.date = function (value, element) {
            return this.optional(element) || !moment(value, 'ddd D MMM GGGG').isValid();
        };
    });
</script>

<script>
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function (event) {
        $.validator.methods.date = function (value, element) {
            return this.optional(element) || !moment(value, 'ddd D MMM GGGG').isValid();
        };
    });
</script>

                <button type="submit" class="cta"><span>rechercher</span></button>
            </div>
        </form>
    </div>

        <div class="cols">
            <div class="col">

    <h2 class="tt-raw-light">CONTACTEZ-NOUS</h2>

        </a>
    </p>
</div>

            <div class="col">
<div class="block">
    <h2 class="tt-raw-light">ACC&#232;S RAPIDE</h2>
    <ul>

    <h2 class="tt-raw-light">ESPACE PROFESSIONNEL</h2>
    <ul>

    </ul>

            <div class="col">
<div class="block">
    <h2 class="tt-raw-light">NEWSLETTER</h2>
    <p>Recevez tout ce qui fait l’actualit&#233; des s&#233;jours dans l’Archipel, les offres de nos partenaires et les nouvelles activit&#233;s. </p>
    


<form action="/tourisme/fr-fr/newsletter" id="contact-newsletter-form" method="post" class="form " novalidate>
    <input name="__RequestVerificationToken" type="hidden" value="oFCEyNe8BwuOrZlbDNp55DV-Dbge33Wj5ivRmEYw5KwbQzY8tdbUP__MCfJ5-O1eAiQZOvSzkDjeP4bBD8WkR2oCSqRa_HnWbCK-PpJJmUk1" />
    <div class="line ">
        <p class="field">
            <span class="input">
                <label class="placeholder" for="NewsletterEmail">Votre adresse e-mail</label>
                <input data-val="true" data-val-email="Invalide" data-val-required="Email requis" id="NewsletterEmail" name="NewsletterEmail" type="email" value="" />
                
            </span>
        </p>
        <button type="submit" class="cta-submit"><span>Ok</span></button>
    </div>
</form>

<script>
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function (event) {
        $.validator.setDefaults({
            highlight: function (element, errorClass, validClass) {
                $(element).addClass(errorClass).removeClass(validClass);
                $(element).parents(".line").addClass("error").removeClass(validClass);
                if ($.grep($(element).parents("form").find(".line"), function (l) { return $(l).hasClass("error"); }).length > 0)
                    $(element).parents("form").addClass("error").removeClass(validClass);
            },
            unhighlight: function (element, errorClass, validClass) {
                $(element).removeClass(errorClass).addClass(validClass);
                $(element).parents(".line").removeClass("error").addClass(validClass);
                if ($.grep($(element).parents("form").find(".line"), function (l) { return $(l).hasClass("error"); }).length > 0 === false)
                    $(element).parents("form").removeClass("error").addClass(validClass);
            }
        });
        $('body').on('submit', 'form#contact-newsletter-form', function (e) {
            var $form = $(this);

            $.post($form.attr("action"), $form.serialize())
                .done(function (data) {
                    $form./*parents('section').*/replaceWith(data);
                })
                .fail(function () {
                    alert("Page non trouvée");
                });

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>

    
</div>            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    </div>
